Naeeldar, I've noticed that roughly half of each
digest is text you haven't bothered to snip. Those of
us reading in digest mode must scroll past an average
of 2 to 3 pages of old posts, for each new post you
make. Can you kindly <snip> out the extraneous
portions? Quoting is fine, but you needn't quote text
from last week.



Double Entendre
